description.narrative: Project support (Health staff salary), which contributes to Health â€“ General, Immunization. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2017, women, children, especially the most vulnerable have access to and utilize high-impact health interventions and communities know and adopt the Essential Family Practices of Health to reduce maternal and infant mortality including by emergency situations
